review: Bought this for my parents who do not want to get a smart TV. Being a college student this was a budget Christmas present. I tested it for hours before I gave it to them. They will be using it for Netflix and Pandora, which are some of the only big supported apps right now. They work flawlessly. If you have quality problems, either learn how to use the product correctly or get better Internet. As for the rest, you have to remember... Google has not finished this product. The code for this device is still in Beta, however, it has an enormous amount of potential. Point being said, it works great for supported apps, Tab casting is a little laggy and slow but it should improve with updates. Whenever Google finishes the SDK for this, Then it will definitely be worth it. If you're hesitant now, just wait. Google is a great company and they are nothing like Apple or Microsoft. They give out so much free software that works magnificently. Give them time and this little thing should be fantastic.
author: Andy
